Articles.Content:
It's not the Light or the Dark Side...

No it's not!

It's Retarded Side of the Force!

Long time ago on a Kerbin far, far away... A Star Wars trailer parody was created...

Enjoy!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/aKvRuBwj5B4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
Perhaps you should have used the big scanner instead of the Communitron dish because they replaced it in the trailer and oh no I've gone full pedantic nerd.

@ColKlonk Thanks!

@SuperWeegee4000 Yeah, in fact my first Millenium Falcon had that angular scanner, but I had to make a new one, becouse the old one didn't want to fly. The new one was smaller, and the angular scanner was too big for it. (and btw it didn't want to fly either ;-/ it's flying on the antigravity drives from the Kerbal Foundries ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) )
Outrageously good! Congrats on making TOTM with this, very well deserved.

Thanks guys. You may also be interested in that:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/KlabcNEa128?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
great video. now do the second trailer of the movie

I'd like to, but there are a lot of issues, e.g. I don't think it's possible to have multiple Kerbals running at the same time, or turning around like the stormtroopers.

It's tempting though.

"The stupidity is strong in my family..."
i beleive there is a mod that allows the control of multiple ships or kerbals at the same time, can't remember the name though.
Ships yes, but not Kerbals AFAIK. It's called burn together.
GG WP. Lol! I like it!
this is whole aerodynamic broke it
